Create a nxk matrix of poisson variables 

##Problem 2. 
```{r}
set.seed(1235)
fun1 <- function(n = 100, k = 4, lambda = 4) {
  x <- NULL
  
  for (i in 1:n)
    x <- rbind(x, rpois(k, lambda))
  
  return(x)
}
f1 <- fun1(1000, 4)
mean(f1)
```
```{r}
fun1alt <- function(n = 100, k = 4, lambda = 4) {
  # YOUR CODE HERE
  x <- matrix(rpois(n*k, lambda), ncol = 4) 
  return(x)
}

f1 <- fun1alt(50000, 4)
```
